traits.name: Pounce
traits.text: If the allosaurus moves at least 30 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the allosaurus can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (4d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The ape makes two fist attacks.

traits.text: If the boar moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a tusk attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 3 (1d6) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 11 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

traits.text: If the boar takes 7 damage or less that would reduce it to 0 hit points, it is reduced to 1 hit point instead.

traits.name: Illumination

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d6 - 1) slashing damage.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.text: The frog can breathe air and water

traits.name: Standing Leap
traits.text: The frog's long jump is up to 20 ft. and its high jump is up to 10 ft., with or without a running start.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 11). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the frog can't bite another target.

actions.name: Swallow
actions.text: The frog makes one bite attack against a Small or smaller target it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. The swallowed target is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the frog, and it takes 5 (2d4) acid damage at the start of each of the frog's turns. The frog can have only one target swallowed at a time. If the frog dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse using 5 ft. of movement, exiting prone.

traits.name: Charge
traits.text: If the goat moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 5 (2d4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

traits.name: Sure-Footed
traits.text: The goat has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

actions.name: Ram
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Rampage
traits.text: When the hyena reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the hyena can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage.

traits.name: Variant: Hold Breath
traits.text: The lizard can hold its breath for 15 minutes. (A lizard that has this trait also has a swimming speed of 30 feet.)

traits.name: Variant: Spider Climb
traits.text: The lizard can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Hold Breath
traits.text: While out of water, the octopus can hold its breath for 1 hour.

traits.name: Underwater Camouflage
traits.text: The octopus has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made while underwater.

traits.name: Water Breathing
traits.text: The octopus can breathe only underwater.

actions.name: Tentacles
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape DC 16). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the octopus can't use its tentacles on another target.

actions.name: Ink Cloud (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.text: A 20-foot-radius cloud of ink extends all around the octopus if it is underwater. The area is heavily obscured for 1 minute, although a significant current can disperse the ink. After releasing the ink, the octopus can use the Dash action as a bonus action.

traits.name: Flyby
traits.text: The owl doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
traits.text: The owl has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

actions.name: Talons
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d6 + 1) slashing damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.text: The rat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.text: The rat has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the rat's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or contract a disease. Until the disease is cured, the target can't regain hit points except by magical means, and the target's hit point maximum decreases by 3 (1d6) every 24 hours. If the target's hit point maximum drops to 0 as a result of this disease, the target dies.

actions.name: Claw
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 12). The scorpion has two claws, each of which can grapple only one target.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The scorpion makes three attacks: two with its claws and one with its sting.

actions.name: Sting
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Charge
traits.text: If the sea horse moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 11 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

traits.name: Water Breathing
traits.text: The sea horse can breathe only underwater.

actions.name: Ram
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Blood Frenzy
traits.text: The shark has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

traits.name: Water Breathing
traits.text: The shark can breathe only underwater.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) piercing damage.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.text: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Web Sense
traits.text: While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

traits.name: Web Walker
traits.text: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 9 (2d8) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

actions.name: Web (Recharge 5-6)
actions.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 30/60 ft., one creature. Hit: The target is restrained by webbing. As an action, the restrained target can make a DC 12 Strength check, bursting the webbing on a success. The webbing can also be attacked and destroyed (AC 10; hp 5; vulnerability to fire damage; immunity to bludgeoning, poison, and psychic damage).

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.text: The toad can breathe air and water

traits.name: Standing Leap

actions.name: Swallow
actions.text:
The toad makes one bite attack against a Medium or smaller target it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. The swallowed target is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the toad, and it takes 10 (3d6) acid damage at the start of each of the toad's turns. The toad can have only one target swallowed at a time.
If the toad dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse using 5 feet of movement, exiting prone.

actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

traits.name: Trampling Charge
traits.text: If the mammoth moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 18 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the mammoth can make one stomp attack against it as a bonus action.

actions.name: Gore
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 25 (4d8 + 7) piercing damage.

actions.name: Stomp
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one prone creature. Hit: 29 (4d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
traits.text: The mastiff has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 11 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

traits.name: Beast of Burden
traits.text: The mule is considered to be a Large animal for the purpose of determining its carrying capacity.

traits.name: Sure-Footed
traits.text: The mule has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Hold Breath
traits.text: While out of water, the octopus can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

traits.name: Underwater Camouflage
traits.text: The octopus has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made while underwater.

traits.name: Water Breathing
traits.text: The octopus can breathe only underwater.

actions.name: Tentacles
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 10). Until this grapple ends, the octopus can't use its tentacles on another target.

actions.name: Ink Cloud (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.text: A 5-foot-radius cloud of ink extends all around the octopus if it is underwater. The area is heavily obscured for 1 minute, although a significant current can disperse the ink. After releasing the ink, the octopus can use the Dash action as a bonus action.

traits.name: Flyby
traits.text: The owl doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
traits.text: The owl has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 slashing damage.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.text: The panther has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Pounce
traits.text: If the panther moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the panther can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

traits.name: Hold Breath
traits.text: The plesiosaurus can hold its breath for 1 hour.

traits.text: The bear has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

actions.name: Multiattack

traits.text: The quipper has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

traits.name: Water Breathing

traits.name: Mimicry
traits.text: The raven can mimic simple sounds it has heard, such as a person whispering, a baby crying, or an animal chittering. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 10 Wisdom (Insight) check.

actions.name: Beak
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.text: The shark has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the shark's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

traits.name: Water Breathing
traits.text: The shark can breathe only underwater.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Charge
traits.text: If the rhinoceros moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Sting
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 1 piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 9 Constitution saving throw, taking 4 (1d8) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Water Breathing
traits.text: The sea horse can breathe only underwater.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.text: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Web Sense
traits.text: While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

traits.name: Web Walker
traits.text: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 1 piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 9 Constitution saving throw or take 2 (1d4) poison damage.

actions.name: Blood Drain
actions.text:
Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage, and the stirge attaches to the target. While attached, the stirge doesn't attack. Instead, at the start of each of the stirge's turns, the target loses 5 (1d4 + 3) hit points due to blood loss.
The stirge can detach itself by spending 5 feet of its movement. It does so after it drains 10 hit points of blood from the target or the target dies. A creature, including the target, can use its action to detach the stirge.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.text: The tiger has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Pounce

If the target is prone, the horse can make another attack with its hooves against it as a bonus action.

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
traits.text: The wolf has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.text: The wolf has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the wolf's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 11 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

name: Air Elemental
resistances: Lightning, Thunder; Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from Nonmagical Attacks
conditionImmunities: Exhaustion, Grappled, Paralyzed, Petrified, Poisoned, Prone, Restrained, Unconscious

traits.name: Air Form
traits.text: The elemental can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The elemental makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Whirlwind (Recharge 4-6)
actions.text:
Each creature in the elemental's space must make a DC 13 Strength saving throw. On a failure, a target takes 15 (3d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage and is flung up 20 feet away from the elemental in a random direction and knocked prone. If a thrown target strikes an object, such as a wall or floor, the target takes 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was thrown. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage and be knocked prone.

If the saving throw is successful, the target takes half the bludgeoning damage and isn't flung away or knocked prone.

name: Earth Elemental
resistances: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from Nonmagical Attacks

traits.name: Earth Glide
traits.text: The elemental can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the elemental doesn't disturb the material it moves through.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.text: The elemental deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The elemental makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

name: Fire Elemental
resistances: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from Nonmagical Attacks
conditionImmunities: Exhaustion, Grappled, Paralyzed, Petrified, Poisoned, Prone, Restrained, Unconscious

traits.name: Fire Form
traits.text: The elemental can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing. A creature that touches the elemental or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 (1d10) fire damage. In addition, the elemental can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. The first time it enters a creature's space on a turn, that creature takes 5 (1d10) fire damage and catches fire; until someone takes an action to douse the fire, the creature takes 5 (1d10) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

traits.name: Illumination
traits.text: The elemental sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light in an additional 30 feet.

traits.name: Water Susceptibility
traits.text: For every 5 feet the elemental moves in water, or for every gallon of water splashed on it, it takes 1 cold damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The elemental makes two touch attacks.

actions.name: Touch
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) fire damage. If the target is a creature or a flammable object, it ignites. Until a creature takes an action to douse the fire, the target takes 5 (1d10) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

name: Water Elemental
resistances: Acid; Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from Nonmagical Attacks
conditionImmunities: Exhaustion, Grappled, Paralyzed, Petrified, Poisoned, Prone, Restrained, Unconscious

traits.name: Water Form
traits.text: The elemental can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

traits.name: Freeze
traits.text: If the elemental takes cold damage, it partially freezes; its speed is reduced by 20 feet until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The elemental makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Whelm (Recharge 4–6)
actions.text:
Each creature in the elemental's space must make a DC 15 Strength saving throw. On a failure, a target takes 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If it is Large or smaller, it is also grappled (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained and unable to breathe unless it can breathe water. If the saving throw is successful, the target is pushed out of the elemental's space.

The elemental can grapple one Large creature or up to two Medium or smaller creatures at one time. At the start of each of the elemental's turns, each target grappled by it takes 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. A creature within 5 feet of the elemental can pull a creature or object out of it by taking an action to make a DC 14 Strength and succeeding.
